data.title: Kilnoski Funeral Home & Crematory

data.text:
John Oliver Ross, age 77, passed away February 28, 2021. He was born November 10, 1943 to Roy and Vesta (Baker) Ross in Council Bluffs, IA.

In addition to his parents, he was preceded in death by his wife, RoseAnne M. Ross; daughter, Rose Marie Dixon; great grandson, Nikolas Sorick; brothers, Leon Ross, Harold Ross, James Ross, Roy Ross Jr., Gary Ross, Richard Ross; sisters, Sharon Childers, and Violet Edenburn, June Ross, and Christina Garcia.

John is survived by his children, Brenda Hord, John Ross (Dawn), Belinda Obradovich (Scott); brother-in-law, Jerry Dixon; sister, Betty Edenburn; grandchildren, Billie, Jere, Donnie, Jamie, Randie, Brandon, Heather, Justin, Britney, Sydney, Holly, Cody and Alyssa; 30 great grandchildren; and a host of other family and friends.

Private Family Service will be held.
